successes.title: Iota: Never lose sight of what's important.
successes.description: The smallest, longest-lasting GPS tracker in the world. But it does WAY more, and all on a new nationwide network with no monthly fees.

Pledges.description: Pledge $10 and get your name on the contributor list on the Iotera website and keep up-to-date on all things Iota with exclusive updates. You can also sign up for more updates at http://www.iotera.com/email_signup

(Free Shipping, only available in USA)

Punctual bird - "A wizard is never late, he arrives precisely when means to." Iota + Home Base + attachment accessories. This package will retail for $199.
(Free Shipping, only available in USA)

DOUBLE DIPPER EARLY BIRD - It's dangerous to go alone! The Iota would get lonely if we shipped it to you by itself, buy it a friend! 2 Iotas + Home Base + attachment accessories.
This package will retail for $299.
(Free Shipping, only available in USA)

DOUBLE DIPPER PUNCTUAL BIRD - As you swooped down from your perch in the early morning light, your talons grasped not one worm but TWO! It's gonna be a good day. 2 Iotas + Home Base + attachment accessories.
This package will retail for $299.
(Free Shipping, only available in USA)

TRIPLE DIPPER - As you swooped down from your perch in the early morning light, your talons grasped not one worm but THREE! It's gonna be a good day. 3 Iotas + Home Base + attachment accessories. 
This package will retail for $399.
(Free Shipping, only available in USA)
Estimated delivery: Jan 2015
Ships within the US only

TWO PACK - If you have 2 locations where you want to get coverage this is the package for you! package includes 2 Home Bases and 2 Iotas + attachment accessories.
This package will retail for $399.
(Free Shipping, only available in USA)

QUADRUPLER DIPPER - As you swooped down from your perch in the early morning light, your talons grasped not one worm but FOUR! It's gonna be a good day. 4 Iotas + Home Base + attachment accessories. This package will retail for $499. (Free Shipping, only available in USA) Estimated delivery: Jan 2015 Ships within the US only

NEIGHBORHOOD PACKAGE - Kickstart your local neighborhood! package includes 4 Home Bases and 4 Iotas + attachment accessories.
This package will retail for $799.
(Free Shipping, only available in USA)
I GOT LOTS OF STUFF PACKAGE - Package includes 10 Iotas + 2 Home Bases + attachment accessories. This package will retail for $1199. (Free Shipping, only available in USA)

RESELLER PACKAGE - 10 Iotas + 10 Home Bases + attachment accessories.  Get your hands on an enviable loot.  This package will retail for $2000 (Free Shipping, only available in USA).
